briefTitle: Evaluation of Diagnostic HIV Ag/Ab Combo Assay
officialTitle: Evaluation of ARCHITECT HIV Ag/Ab Combo Assay
summary: To test blood specimens using a new investigational test that detects antigen and antibody to human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Results will be compared to an approved HIV antibody test and supplemental testing performed to determine HIV status.

primaryOutcome.measure: Architect HIV Combo Test Data for Clinical Specificity in Population at Low Risk for HIV Infection

effectByArm.arm: Architect HIV Ag/Ab Specificity - Low Risk for HIV Infection
